name: Unsuccessful attempt to electrify humanity
description:
The game is addictive with simple but dynamic gameplay. Due to the random, the established patterns are not followed.

The game will give you the opportunity to be a human fighting and aliens due to electrification. It turns out to be different for everyone and everyone understands it differently.

WASD control + mouse + left shift + mouse wheel.
The game also contains the necessary tips and instructions.
